Français

Interested in robotics since a long time, I graduated from the Master Science pour l'Ingénieur (Sorbonne University ex UPMC) mention Advanced Systems and Robotics where I acquired various experiences from design to code development, allowing me to acquire various skills in the robotics field. ...
I wish to be one of the actors of the modernization of robotics and to make France shine in terms of advancement in this sector, either within the research and development department of a small or large company, or as a researcher in a research institute.
Working in a team or alone, my interest and motivation will always be there to meet the various demands of a robotics project with the best quality and in the best time.
I love learning new technologies and am not afraid to self-train or take courses to increase my knowledge and abilities.

2022
March-August RESEARCH ENGINEER (fixed-term contract) Institut national de recherche pour l'agriculture, l'alimentation et l'environnement (INRAE) Unité Technologies et systèmes d'information pour les agrosystèmes (TSCF) Clermont-Ferrand, France This mission, carried out in the continuation of the training course carried out previously, had for objective the study of two approaches of coupling of a manipulator robot arm with a mobile base with wheel. 2021
March-August INTERNSHIP Institut national de recherche pour l'agriculture, l'alimentation et l'environnement Unité Technologies et systèmes d'information pour les agrosystèmes (TSCF) Clermont-Ferrand, France Internship carried out in the ROMEA team of the TSCF research unit. The goal of this internship was the study of a control command coupling a manipulator robot arm with a mobile wheel base. 2019
January-May INTERNSHIP Institut national de recherche Agronomique Laboratoire de Génie et Microbiologie des Procédés Alimentaires AgroParisTech's campus, Thiverval-Grignon, France Stage effectué au sein de l'unité mixte de recherche GMPA. Le but de ce stage était la mise au point d'un appareillage de suivi d'échantillons dans une cuve de cuisson, par spectrométrie dans le proche infrarouge et le visible.
